resources.string:
PadLock requires a special Accessibility Service to secure your device. 

This service is used to monitor for the applications that you want to be locked. When PadLock notices that you have launched an application that you want to lock, it will secure the application with a custom lock screen. 

Please select the 'PadLock' Accessibility Service from the Settings menu and enable the service.

PadLock needs this service to monitor which apps launch on your device. 

It will not capture any personal data.
It does not have the ability to connect to the Internet. 
It will only watch the apps you launch and lock the ones you request.
PadLock will not be activated until you set a PIN code.
Click the button to get started.
Locks applications based on the app that they were installed with
Locking is controlled by package. If the package is locked (from the list) this activity will lock too
Locking, even by package is ignored. This activity will never be locked
Always lock this activity, even if the package is not locked

This is a lightweight application which will improve your device's security by protecting applications from prying eyes. Lock applications with a special password to keep your information safe and secure. 

PadLock is free to use, and entirely open source! You can view the source online at: 

https://github.com/pyamsoft/padlock 

Are you ready to go?
